name: Lucemon
effect: While you have 10 or more cards in your trash, when playing this card from your hand, reduce its play cost by 8.[On Play] ＜Recovery +1 (Deck)＞. (Place the top card of your deck on top of your security stack.)[All Turns] This Digimon can only digivolve into Digimon with [Lucemon] in their names.
